attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i ask the prime minister to raise the payment benefit given to carers, the statistics show that in certain carering types for looking after a disabled relative could be saving the govrnment approx £400.00 a week as they only pay people who look after there relatives £50.00 approx 
these people save the government loads of money on nursing homes and home help so please help try to get these people a proper payed wage as that is what it is classed as and it is taxed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
